title: website: go tour should give better error for missing package
body:
by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
OS: Windows Seven Ultimate
Go: go version go1.0.1
GOROOT: C:\Go\
Path: C:\Go\bin
Install Package: go1.0.1.windows-amd64.msi
Browser: Firefox, IE, Chrome

The problem is the go tour won't compile. I hit run, "Waiting for remote
server" appears, then disappers and nothing happens.
I saw that http://127.0.0.1:3999/compile returns an empty json, like the following:
{"output":"","compile_errors":""}
Post data, instead, seems correct: 

body	
  package main 

  import "fmt" 

  func main() { 
    fmt.Println("Hello, 世界") 
  }
